meanings.definition: A person or thing that shoves.
meanings.sent1: The shovers at the construction site were busy moving heavy materials.
meanings.sent2: The group of shovers pushed the broken-down car to the side of the road.
meanings.sent3: The little robot acted like a shovers, constantly pushing buttons and switches.
meanings.sent4: In the game, the player controlled a shovers, pushing obstacles out of the way to reach the goal.
meanings.sent5: The determined shovers used all their strength to shove the boulder aside.

meanings.sent1: The team of shovers worked together to clear the path after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The shovers gathered around the fallen tree, ready to move it out of the way.
meanings.sent3: The field was filled with shovers, each one eager to lend a hand.
meanings.sent4: The shovers in the warehouse swiftly moved the boxes to their designated spots.
meanings.sent5: As the event ended, the shovers quickly cleaned up the venue.
